description: This is a Dart source file defining the SyncService class, responsible for managing synchronization of local data with a backend server, including initiation, manual sync, and background sync controls.

classes.name: SyncService
classes.description: Service class for synchronizing local data with backend, managing sync state, and providing manual and auto sync controls.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the sync service, potentially loading last sync time and setting up periodic sync.

methods.name: syncNow
methods.description: Manually triggers a synchronization process, handling conflict resolution and updating sync timestamp.
